dc_description_s: Shows natural features, railroads, important roads, ordinary roads, carries and trails. "Distances are given in Figures on Roads and Trails. Air-Line Distances from Mount Marcy are indicated by Circles, 10 miles apart." Airline distances from "A.C.A. Camp" at Bow & Arrow Point, North Hero, Vt. shown by circles 1 mile apart up to 10 miles.; Relief shown by hachures and spot heights.; Cover title: Map of the Adirondacks.; Prime meridians: Greenwich (top) and Washington (bottom). Latitudes not indicated.; Neat line on the north, west, and south is a circle whose diameter is approximately 120 mi. on the 74th meridian W of Greenwich (also nominally 3âˆž E of Washington), center just west of Mount Marcy.|77 x 61 centimeters, in cloth-covered boards|Scale [1:253,440] 1 inch to 4 miles|General Map Collection
